typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrganizationUUID as string,
		OrganizationName as string,
		OrganizationPurview as string,
		OrganizationWebsite as string,
		OrganizationPhoneNumber as string,
		OrganizationContactName as string,
		OrganizationContactEmail as string,
		DataMappingURL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTOrganizations
UTOrganizations sink(input(
		OrganizationUUID as string,
		OrganizationName as string,
		OrganizationPurview as string,
		OrganizationWebsite as string,
		OrganizationPhoneNumber as string,
		OrganizationContactName as string,
		OrganizationContactEmail as string,
		DataMappingURL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['organizations.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NormalizedOrganizations

source(output(
		ReportingUnitUUID as string,
		ReportingUnitNativeID as string,
		ReportingUnitName as string,
		ReportingUnitTypeCV as string,
		ReportingUnitUpdateDate as string,
		ReportingUnitProductVersion as string,
		StateCV as string,
		EPSGCodeCV as string,
		Geometry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTReportingUnits
UTReportingUnits sink(input(
		ReportingUnitUUID as string,
		ReportingUnitNativeID as string,
		ReportingUnitName as string,
		ReportingUnitTypeCV as string,
		ReportingUnitUpdateDate as string,
		ReportingUnitProductVersion as string,
		StateCV as string,
		EPSGCodeCV as string,
		Geometry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['reportingunits.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NormalizedReportingUnits

source(output(
		WRCHEX as string,
		POD_TYPE as string,
		NS_DIRECTION as string,
		NS_DISTANCE as string,
		EW_DIRECTION as string,
		EW_DISTANCE as string,
		SECTION_CORNER as string,
		STR as string,
		DIVERTING_WORKS as string,
		POD_COMMENT as string,
		WELL_DIAMETER as string,
		WELL_DEPTH1 as string,
		WELL_DEPTH2 as string,
		WELL_YEAR_DRILLED as string,
		WELL_LOG as string,
		WIN as string,
		X_UTM as string,
		Y_UTM as string,
		ELEVATION as string,
		recordId as string,
		MANUAL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTPointsOfDiversion
source(output(
		XCoord as string,
		YCoord as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTConvertedPoints
UTPointsOfDiversion derive(SiteUUID = 'UT_' + WRCHEX,
		SiteNativeID = WRCHEX,
		SiteName = 'UT_' + WRCHEX,
		USGSSiteID = '',
		SiteTypeCV = case(POD_TYPE == '', ''
    ,POD_TYPE == 'A', 'UT_A'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'C', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'D', 'UT_D'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'F', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'G', 'Spring'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'N', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'P', 'UT_CFNP'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'R', 'UT_R'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'S', 'UT_S'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'T', 'UT_T'
    ,POD_TYPE == 'U', 'UT_U'),
		Geometry = '',
		CoordinateMethodCV = 'GPS',
		CoordinateAccuracy = '',
		GNISCodeCV = '',
		EPSGCodeCV = 'EPSG4326') ~> DerivedPointsOfDiversion
DerivedPointsOfDiversion select(mapColumn(
		SiteUUID,
		SiteNativeID,
		SiteName,
		USGSSiteID,
		SiteTypeCV,
		Geometry,
		CoordinateMethodCV,
		CoordinateAccuracy,
		GNISCodeCV,
		EPSGCodeCV,
		XCoord = X_UTM,
		YCoord = Y_UTM
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectPointsOfDiversion
SelectPointsOfDiversion, UTConvertedPoints join(SelectPointsOfDiversion@XCoord == UTConvertedPoints@XCoord
	&& SelectPointsOfDiversion@YCoord == UTConvertedPoints@YCoord,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinConvertedPoints
JoinConvertedPoints select(mapColumn(
		SiteUUID,
		SiteNativeID,
		SiteName,
		USGSSiteID,
		SiteTypeCV,
		Geometry,
		CoordinateMethodCV,
		CoordinateAccuracy,
		GNISCodeCV,
		EPSGCodeCV,
		Latitude,
		Longitude
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectJoined
SelectJoined sink(input(
		SiteUUID as string,
		SiteNativeID as string,
		SiteName as string,
		USGSSiteID as string,
		SiteTypeCV as string,
		Longitude as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Geometry as string,
		CoordinateMethodCV as string,
		CoordinateAccuracy as string,
		GNISCodeCV as string,
		EPSGCodeCV as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sites.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NormalizedSites

source(output(
		VariableSpecificUUID as string,
		VariableSpecificCV as string,
		VariableCV as string,
		AggregationStatisticCV as string,
		AggregationInterval as string,
		AggregationIntervalUnitCV as string,
		ReportYearStartMonth as string,
		ReportYearTypeCV as string,
		AmountUnitCV as string,
		MaximumAmountUnitCV as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTVariables
UTVariables sink(input(
		VariableSpecificUUID as string,
		VariableSpecificCV as string,
		VariableCV as string,
		AggregationStatisticCV as string,
		AggregationInterval as string,
		AggregationIntervalUnitCV as string,
		ReportYearStartMonth as string,
		ReportYearTypeCV as string,
		AmountUnitCV as string,
		MaximumAmountUnitCV as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['variables.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NormalizedVariables

source(output(
		WRNUM as string,
		APPL_CLAIM_NUMBER as string,
		CERTIFICATE_NUMBER as string,
		LAND_OWNERSHIP as string,
		WREX_CFS as string,
		WREX_ANDOR as string,
		WREX_ACFT as string,
		WREX_SOURCE as string,
		WREX_COUNTY as string,
		COMMON_DESCRIPTION as string,
		DATE_FILED as string,
		TAKEN_BY_INITIALS as string,
		DATE_PRIORITY as string,
		ADV_NEWSPAPER as string,
		DATE_PUB_BEGAN as string,
		DATE_PROOF_PUB as string,
		PROTESTED as string,
		DATE_PROTEST_END as string,
		MEMO_DECISION as string,
		DATE_APPROVED_REJECTED as string,
		APPROVED_REJECTED as string,
		DATE_PROOF_DUE as string,
		DATE_EXTENSION_FILED as string,
		ELECTION_PROOF as string,
		DATE_ELECTION_PROOF as string,
		DATE_CERT_WUC_ISSUED as string,
		DATE_TERMINATED as string,
		PDBOOK_NUMBER as string,
		TYPE_OF_RIGHT as string,
		WREX_STATUS as string,
		DOCUMENT_ENTERED as string,
		MAP_NUMBER as string,
		DATE_RUSH_LETTER as string,
		DATE_RENOVATED as string,
		DATE_VERIFIED as string,
		VERIFIED_BY_INITIALS as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT1 as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT2 as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT3 as string,
		DATE_PUB_ENDED as string,
		MODIFIED_LOGON as string,
		DATE_RECON_REQUESTED as string,
		RECONSIDER_TYPE as string,
		IRRIGATION_DIVERSION as string,
		IRRIGATION_DEPLETION as string,
		STOCK_DIVERSION as string,
		STOCK_DEPLETION as string,
		DOMESTIC_DIVERSION as string,
		DOMESTIC_DEPLETION as string,
		MUNICIPAL_DIVERSION as string,
		MUNICIPAL_DEPLETION as string,
		MINING_DIVERSION as string,
		MINING_DEPLETION as string,
		POWER_DIVERSION as string,
		POWER_DEPLETION as string,
		OTHER_DIVERSION as string,
		OTHER_DEPLETION as string,
		EXNUM as string,
		EXCHANGE_BASE_WRNUM as string,
		EXCHANGE_CONTRACT_NUMBER as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED1 as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED2 as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED3 as string,
		EXCHANGE_CFS as string,
		EXCHANGE_ANDOR as string,
		EXCHANGE_ACFT as string,
		EXCHANGE_BEG_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_END_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_SOURCE as string,
		EXCHANGE_COUNTY as string,
		EXCHANGE_PORELEASE_SAME as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_CFS as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_ANDOR as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_ACFT as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_BEG_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_END_DATE as string,
		WATER_USES as string,
		DATE_WUCS_RECEIVED as string,
		MANUAL_EVALUATION as string,
		ACRE_FEET_EXPORTED as string,
		DATE_HEARING_HELD as string,
		DIVERSION_DUTY as string,
		DEPLETION_DUTY as string,
		GROWING_SEASON as string,
		DATE_FIELD_REVIEW as string,
		AREA_CODE as string,
		ACTIVE_LITIGATION as string,
		DSYSDB_NUMBER as string,
		REPORT_TYPE as string,
		PROOF_DUE_YEARS as string,
		PUBLIC_VIEW as string,
		WATER_USE_REPORTING as string,
		STREAM_ALT_REQUIRED as string,
		DAM_PERMIT_REQUIRED as string,
		WR_SOLE_SUPPLY as string,
		DATE_LAPSING_LETTER as string,
		STOCK_COMPANY_ID as string,
		SHARES_OF_STOCK as string,
		OSE_SIGNATURE as string,
		CERT_SIGNATURE as string,
		PROOF_PROF_LICENSE_NUMBER as string,
		COUNTY_TAX_ID as string,
		LAST_MODIFIED_TYPE as string,
		LAST_MODIFIED_TABLE as string,
		FILE_DESTROYED as string,
		DATE_50YEAR_PERIOD as string,
		SUB_BASIN_NUMBER as string,
		SUB_BASIN_NAME as string,
		DIVDEP_DOCUMENT_ID as string,
		FULL_SUPPLY_EQUIVALENCE as string,
		RECORD_ID as string,
		SHARES_DISTRIBUTION as string,
		DECREE_CLASS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTMaster
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTWaterUses
source(output(
		WRCHEX as string,
		OWNER_NAME as string,
		OWNER_ADDRESS as string,
		OWNER_CITY as string,
		OWNER_STATE as string,
		OWNER_ZIPCODE as string,
		OWNER_INTEREST as string,
		OWNER_PHONE as string,
		OWNER_REMARKS as string,
		OWNER_CARE_OF as string,
		OWNER_EMAIL_ADDRESS as string,
		OWNER_FIRST_NAME as string,
		OWNER_LAST_NAME as string,
		OWNER_TITLE as string,
		OWNER_ADDRESS1 as string,
		OWNER_ADDRESS2 as string,
		OWNER_ADDRESS3 as string,
		DATE_WUC_SIGNED as string,
		BAD_ADDRESS as string,
		PUBLIC_WATER_SUPPLIER as string,
		TITLE_CONFLICT as string,
		TITLE_CONFLICT_COMMENTS as string,
		OWNER_TYPE as string,
		ATTORNEY_RECORD_ID as string,
		recordId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTOwners
source(output(
		WRNUM as string,
		GROUP_IDNUM as string,
		USE_IDNUM as string,
		IRRIGATION_ACREAGE as string,
		SOLE_SUPPLY as string,
		DIVERSION_LIMIT as string,
		USE_BEG_DATE as string,
		USE_END_DATE as string,
		IRRIGATION_COMMENTS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTIrrigationMaster
JoinWaterUses derive(BeneficialUseCategory = replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(Value, 'OTH', 'Other'), 'POW', 'Power'), 'MUN', 'Mining'), 'STK', 'Stockwatering') , 'IRR', 'Irrigation'), 'DOM', 'Domestic'),
		PrimaryUseCategory = '') ~> DerivedWaterUses
SelectMaster, UTWaterUses join(AllocationNativeID == Id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinWaterUses
SelectMaster, UTOwners join(AllocationNativeID == WRCHEX,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinOwners
SelectMaster, UTIrrigationMaster join(AllocationNativeID == WRNUM,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinIrrigation
JoinOwners derive(AllocationOwner = OWNER_LAST_NAME + ', ' + OWNER_FIRST_NAME) ~> DerivedOwners
JoinIrrigation derive(AllocationTimeframeStart = USE_BEG_DATE,
		AllocationTimeframeEnd = USE_END_DATE) ~> DerivedIrrigation
UTMaster derive(OrganizationUUID = 'UTWRE',
		VariableSpecificUUID = 'Allocation All',
		SiteUUID = 'UT_' + WRNUM,
		WaterSourceUUID = 'UT_' + WRNUM,
		DataPublicationDate = toString(currentDate()),
		DataPublicationDOI = '',
		AllocationBasisCV = '',
		AllocationNativeID = WRNUM,
		AllocationLegalStatusCV = case(WREX_STATUS == 'ABAN', ''
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'ADEC', 'UT_ADEC'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'AMEN', ''
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'APP', 'UT_APP'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'CERT', 'UT_CERT'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'DIS', 'UT_DIS'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'EXP', 'UT_EXP'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'FORF', 'UT_FORF'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'INV', ''
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'LAP', 'UT_LAP'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'LAPD', 'UT_LAPD'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'NPR', 'UT_NPR'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'NUSE', 'UT_NUSE'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'PERF', 'UT_PERF'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'REJ', 'UT_REJ'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'REJD', 'UT_REJD'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'RNUM', 'UT_RNUM'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'TERM', 'UT_TERM'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'UNAP', 'UT_UNAP'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'WD', 'UT_WD'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'WDD', 'UT_WDD'
    ,WREX_STATUS == 'WUC', 'UT_WUC'),
		AllocationTypeCV = case(TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'ADEC', 'UT_ADEC'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'ADJC', ''
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'ADV', 'UT_ADV'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'APPL', 'UT_APPL'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'DEC', 'UT_DEC'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'DIL', 'UT_DIL'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'FEDR', 'UT_FEDR'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'FIXD', 'UT_FIXD'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'PAC', 'UT_PAC'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'SHAR', 'UT_SHAR'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'TEMP', 'UT_TEMP'
    ,TYPE_OF_RIGHT == 'UGWC', 'UT_UGWC'),
		AllocationApplicationDate = toString(toDate(DATE_FILED, 'yyyyMMdd')),
		AllocationPriorityDate = toString(toDate(DATE_PRIORITY, 'yyyyMMdd')),
		AllocationExpirationDate = toString(toDate(DATE_TERMINATED, 'yyyyMMdd')),
		AllocationChangeApplicationIndicator = '',
		LegacyAllocationIDs = '',
		AllocationCropDutyAmount = IRRIGATION_DEPLETION,
		AllocationAmount = WREX_CFS,
		AllocationMaximum = WREX_ACFT,
		PopulationServed = '',
		PowerGeneratedGWh = '',
		AllocationCommunityWaterSupplySystem = '',
		AllocationSDWISIdentifier = '',
		IrrigatedAcreage = '',
		AllocationAssociatedWithdrawalSiteIDs = '',
		AllocationAssociatedConsumptiveUseSiteIDs = '',
		WaterAllocationNativeURL = '',
		MethodUUID = 'UT_WaterAllocation') ~> DerivedMaster
DerivedMaster select(mapColumn(
		OrganizationUUID,
		VariableSpecificUUID,
		SiteUUID,
		MethodUUID,
		WaterSourceUUID,
		DataPublicationDate,
		DataPublicationDOI,
		AllocationBasisCV,
		AllocationNativeID,
		AllocationLegalStatusCV,
		AllocationTypeCV,
		AllocationApplicationDate,
		AllocationPriorityDate,
		AllocationExpirationDate,
		AllocationChangeApplicationIndicator,
		LegacyAllocationIDs,
		AllocationCropDutyAmount,
		AllocationAmount,
		AllocationMaximum,
		PopulationServed,
		PowerGeneratedGWh,
		AllocationCommunityWaterSupplySystem,
		AllocationSDWISIdentifier,
		IrrigatedAcreage,
		AllocationAssociatedWithdrawalSiteIDs,
		AllocationAssociatedConsumptiveUseSiteIDs,
		WaterAllocationNativeURL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectMaster
DerivedOwners select(mapColumn(
		OrganizationUUID,
		VariableSpecificUUID,
		SiteUUID,
		MethodUUID,
		WaterSourceUUID,
		DataPublicationDate,
		DataPublicationDOI,
		AllocationBasisCV,
		AllocationNativeID,
		AllocationLegalStatusCV,
		AllocationTypeCV,
		AllocationApplicationDate,
		AllocationPriorityDate,
		AllocationExpirationDate,
		AllocationChangeApplicationIndicator,
		LegacyAllocationIDs,
		AllocationCropDutyAmount,
		AllocationAmount,
		AllocationMaximum,
		PopulationServed,
		PowerGeneratedGWh,
		AllocationCommunityWaterSupplySystem,
		AllocationSDWISIdentifier,
		IrrigatedAcreage,
		AllocationAssociatedWithdrawalSiteIDs,
		AllocationAssociatedConsumptiveUseSiteIDs,
		WaterAllocationNativeURL,
		AllocationOwner
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectOwners
DerivedIrrigation select(mapColumn(
		OrganizationUUID,
		VariableSpecificUUID,
		SiteUUID,
		MethodUUID,
		WaterSourceUUID,
		DataPublicationDate,
		DataPublicationDOI,
		AllocationBasisCV,
		AllocationNativeID,
		AllocationLegalStatusCV,
		AllocationTypeCV,
		AllocationApplicationDate,
		AllocationPriorityDate,
		AllocationExpirationDate,
		AllocationChangeApplicationIndicator,
		LegacyAllocationIDs,
		AllocationCropDutyAmount,
		AllocationAmount,
		AllocationMaximum,
		PopulationServed,
		PowerGeneratedGWh,
		AllocationCommunityWaterSupplySystem,
		AllocationSDWISIdentifier,
		IrrigatedAcreage,
		AllocationAssociatedWithdrawalSiteIDs,
		AllocationAssociatedConsumptiveUseSiteIDs,
		WaterAllocationNativeURL,
		AllocationTimeframeStart,
		AllocationTimeframeEnd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectIrrigation
DerivedWaterUses select(mapColumn(
		OrganizationUUID,
		VariableSpecificUUID,
		SiteUUID,
		WaterSourceUUID,
		DataPublicationDate,
		DataPublicationDOI,
		AllocationBasisCV,
		AllocationNativeID,
		AllocationLegalStatusCV,
		AllocationTypeCV,
		AllocationApplicationDate,
		AllocationPriorityDate,
		AllocationExpirationDate,
		AllocationChangeApplicationIndicator,
		LegacyAllocationIDs,
		AllocationCropDutyAmount,
		AllocationAmount,
		AllocationMaximum,
		PopulationServed,
		PowerGeneratedGWh,
		AllocationCommunityWaterSupplySystem,
		AllocationSDWISIdentifier,
		IrrigatedAcreage,
		AllocationAssociatedWithdrawalSiteIDs,
		AllocationAssociatedConsumptiveUseSiteIDs,
		WaterAllocationNativeURL,
		BeneficialUseCategory,
		PrimaryUseCategory,
		MethodUUID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectWaterUses
SelectWaterUses, SelectMaster, SelectOwners, SelectIrrigation union(byName: true)~> UnionWaterAllocations
UnionWaterAllocations sink(input(
		OrganizationUUID as string,
		VariableSpecificUUID as string,
		SiteUUID as string,
		WaterSourceUUID as string,
		MethodUUID as string,
		PrimaryUseCategory as string,
		BeneficialUseCategory as string,
		DataPublicationDate as string,
		DataPublicationDOI as string,
		AllocationNativeID as string,
		AllocationOwner as string,
		AllocationBasisCV as string,
		AllocationLegalStatusCV as string,
		AllocationTypeCV as string,
		AllocationApplicationDate as string,
		AllocationPriorityDate as string,
		AllocationExpirationDate as string,
		AllocationChangeApplicationIndicator as string,
		LegacyAllocationIDs as string,
		AllocationTimeframeStart as string,
		AllocationTimeframeEnd as string,
		AllocationCropDutyAmount as string,
		AllocationAmount as string,
		AllocationMaximum as string,
		PopulationServed as string,
		PowerGeneratedGWh as string,
		IrrigatedAcreage as string,
		AllocationCommunityWaterSupplySystem as string,
		AllocationSDWISIdentifier as string,
		AllocationAssociatedWithdrawalSiteIDs as string,
		AllocationAssociatedConsumptiveUseSiteIDs as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['waterallocations.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NormalizedWaterAllocations

source(output(
		WRNUM as string,
		APPL_CLAIM_NUMBER as string,
		CERTIFICATE_NUMBER as string,
		LAND_OWNERSHIP as string,
		WREX_CFS as string,
		WREX_ANDOR as string,
		WREX_ACFT as string,
		WREX_SOURCE as string,
		WREX_COUNTY as string,
		COMMON_DESCRIPTION as string,
		DATE_FILED as string,
		TAKEN_BY_INITIALS as string,
		DATE_PRIORITY as string,
		ADV_NEWSPAPER as string,
		DATE_PUB_BEGAN as string,
		DATE_PROOF_PUB as string,
		PROTESTED as string,
		DATE_PROTEST_END as string,
		MEMO_DECISION as string,
		DATE_APPROVED_REJECTED as string,
		APPROVED_REJECTED as string,
		DATE_PROOF_DUE as string,
		DATE_EXTENSION_FILED as string,
		ELECTION_PROOF as string,
		DATE_ELECTION_PROOF as string,
		DATE_CERT_WUC_ISSUED as string,
		DATE_TERMINATED as string,
		PDBOOK_NUMBER as string,
		TYPE_OF_RIGHT as string,
		WREX_STATUS as string,
		DOCUMENT_ENTERED as string,
		MAP_NUMBER as string,
		DATE_RUSH_LETTER as string,
		DATE_RENOVATED as string,
		DATE_VERIFIED as string,
		VERIFIED_BY_INITIALS as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT1 as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT2 as string,
		ENDORSEMENT_COMMENT3 as string,
		DATE_PUB_ENDED as string,
		MODIFIED_LOGON as string,
		DATE_RECON_REQUESTED as string,
		RECONSIDER_TYPE as string,
		IRRIGATION_DIVERSION as string,
		IRRIGATION_DEPLETION as string,
		STOCK_DIVERSION as string,
		STOCK_DEPLETION as string,
		DOMESTIC_DIVERSION as string,
		DOMESTIC_DEPLETION as string,
		MUNICIPAL_DIVERSION as string,
		MUNICIPAL_DEPLETION as string,
		MINING_DIVERSION as string,
		MINING_DEPLETION as string,
		POWER_DIVERSION as string,
		POWER_DEPLETION as string,
		OTHER_DIVERSION as string,
		OTHER_DEPLETION as string,
		EXNUM as string,
		EXCHANGE_BASE_WRNUM as string,
		EXCHANGE_CONTRACT_NUMBER as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED1 as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED2 as string,
		EXCHANGE_EVIDENCED3 as string,
		EXCHANGE_CFS as string,
		EXCHANGE_ANDOR as string,
		EXCHANGE_ACFT as string,
		EXCHANGE_BEG_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_END_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_SOURCE as string,
		EXCHANGE_COUNTY as string,
		EXCHANGE_PORELEASE_SAME as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_CFS as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_ANDOR as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_ACFT as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_BEG_DATE as string,
		EXCHANGE_RELEASE_END_DATE as string,
		WATER_USES as string,
		DATE_WUCS_RECEIVED as string,
		MANUAL_EVALUATION as string,
		ACRE_FEET_EXPORTED as string,
		DATE_HEARING_HELD as string,
		DIVERSION_DUTY as string,
		DEPLETION_DUTY as string,
		GROWING_SEASON as string,
		DATE_FIELD_REVIEW as string,
		AREA_CODE as string,
		ACTIVE_LITIGATION as string,
		DSYSDB_NUMBER as string,
		REPORT_TYPE as string,
		PROOF_DUE_YEARS as string,
		PUBLIC_VIEW as string,
		WATER_USE_REPORTING as string,
		STREAM_ALT_REQUIRED as string,
		DAM_PERMIT_REQUIRED as string,
		WR_SOLE_SUPPLY as string,
		DATE_LAPSING_LETTER as string,
		STOCK_COMPANY_ID as string,
		SHARES_OF_STOCK as string,
		OSE_SIGNATURE as string,
		CERT_SIGNATURE as string,
		PROOF_PROF_LICENSE_NUMBER as string,
		COUNTY_TAX_ID as string,
		LAST_MODIFIED_TYPE as string,
		LAST_MODIFIED_TABLE as string,
		FILE_DESTROYED as string,
		DATE_50YEAR_PERIOD as string,
		SUB_BASIN_NUMBER as string,
		SUB_BASIN_NAME as string,
		DIVDEP_DOCUMENT_ID as string,
		FULL_SUPPLY_EQUIVALENCE as string,
		RECORD_ID as string,
		SHARES_DISTRIBUTION as string,
		DECREE_CLASS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTMaster
source(output(
		WaterSourceUUID as string,
		WaterSourceNativeID as string,
		WaterSourceName as string,
		WaterSourceTypeCV as string,
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV as string,
		GNISFeatureNameCV as string,
		Geometry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> UTWaterSources
UTMaster derive(WaterSourceUUID = 'UT_' + WRNUM,
		WaterSourceNativeID = WRNUM,
		WaterSourceName = WREX_SOURCE,
		WaterSourceTypeCV = 'unknown',
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV = 'Fresh',
		GNISFeatureNameCV = '',
		Geometry = '') ~> DerivedMaster
DerivedMaster select(mapColumn(
		WaterSourceUUID,
		WaterSourceNativeID,
		WaterSourceName,
		WaterSourceTypeCV,
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV,
		GNISFeatureNameCV,
		Geometry
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectWaterSources
SelectWaterSources, UTWaterSources union(byName: true)~> UnionWaterSources
UnionWaterSources sink(input(
		WaterSourceUUID as string,
		WaterSourceNativeID as string,
		WaterSourceName as string,
		WaterSourceTypeCV as string,
		WaterQualityIndicatorCV as string,
		GNISFeatureNameCV as string,
		Geometry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['watersources.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NormalizedWaterSources
